fields.label: Section Name
fields.description: TDS Section code (e.g., 194C for Contractor, 194J for Professional Services)

fields.label: Description
fields.placeholder: Brief description of what this section covers

fields.label: TDS Rate (%)
fields.description: Standard TDS rate for this section

fields.label: Rate without PAN (%)
fields.description: Higher TDS rate when PAN is not available

fields.label: Threshold Amount
fields.description: TDS is applicable only if transaction exceeds this amount

fields.label: Cumulative Threshold
fields.description: Annual cumulative threshold for TDS applicability

fields.label: Effective From
fields.description: Date from which this rate is effective
